name: The Tie Game
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 34. The theme there was a tie between "Two Button Controls" and "Growing". So i just had to make a game about a Tie

You play as a Tie on a manequin named Pete
You have to slice Bow Ties (competition) and dodge Wine (it'll ruin you) by pressing left or right arrow keys

You grow by slicing Bow Ties and shrink by getting wet

That's pretty much it. Have Fun!!!
